Text: Don't bother with the repack if in the middle downloading this release. The only reason for the nuke is this version installs an extra shortcut on your desktop. The game and crack are 100%, would be helpful if nuke shouters included the reason for the nuke in their post.

i had the same crash issue,i coudnt even get to finish installing the game,but i finally got it to work =) 

1 - first issue,while installin : it said somthing like "an error ocurred while trying to install some crap.." any1 having the same error,just select "ignore" then copy "darkestofdays.exe" inside "skidrow" folder that comes with game to your main instalation folder : "C:\Program Files\8monkey Labs\Darkest of Days"

2 - as for the crash issue,here is what i did: 
go to instalation folder again "C:\Program Files\8monkey Labs\Darkest of Days" there should be a folder (physx) open it,and instal the PhysX_9.09.0814_SystemSoftware(latest version),then go back and open another folder (setup),install oalinst.exe , and vcredist_x86.exe.. et voila!!! the game working like a charm! 

im on windows 7 btw.

thx scorpion

I get a "Cannot identify this version of Darkest of Days. Either this version has already been patched, or the files are corrupt."

I've tried it with out the Crack, with the Skidrow Crack, I've tried updating Nvidia PhysX, I've updated everything in the Setup Folder, still no idea how to update it.

It works without the Patch, it's just it's quite clearly poorly optimized, I only get 70FPS on everything High with 2x AA, and it's not that I'm complaining about that, but sometimes I've seen it go down to 45FPS.

Thanks anyhow.

I got the error message "OpenAL32.dll was not found" so I went ahead and ran oalinst.exe (like stoleyourshoes and others have suggested) and that worked.

One thing though, when I ran the game for the first time the menu was in German. Wasn't really a problem, I just clicked around in the options and fixed it. I thought I might note it here in case anyone else has a similar problem.
